body.p:
Morehead Ky 19 May '65
His Excellency Gov. Bramlette

you are informed that the Christie fork District in Rowan Co is no. 2 in which Wm. A. Foutch & Geo Hall are recommended by petition for J. PS in Sd County -- please ford Commissions -- and in District No 5 please send Commission for Capt. James Carey for J. P. he has lately returned from the War and is Well qualified and has been in Office before the War -- J. E. Johnson wants it, but no Rebel sympathizer should have it especially when he says he got a letter from Lincoln in 'hell'

Very Respectfully & truly
Yrs
John Hargis Cty. atto
